name: Goomba Bros [Wowie Jam 4]
description:
Essentially, it's Mario Reversed.

Instead of playing Mario, you play as the Goomba NPC's.
Instead of going left to right, you go right to left.
Instead of the Goombas killing you if they touch you, they just change direction.
Instead of you killing the Goombas by jumping on them, you use them to jump higher. (you can also make them jump by crouching and standing when they are above you)

The goal is to help your fellow Goomba get to the house, and you have to go as well.

To do so, you will need to COLLABORATE WITH AI since he can't get there without you, and you can't get there without him. It's collaboration that goes BOTH WAYS.

Enjoy!
